translation: Then, Madhava (Krishna) and the son of Pandu (Arjuna), seated in the magnificent chariot yoked with white horses, blew divine conches.
commentary: 1.14 Then then? white (with) white? Hayaih horses? yukte yoked? Great magnificent? Syandane in the chariot? seated in position? Madhava: Madhava? Pandava: Pandava? the son of Pandu? f and? Eve also? Divine divine? Conches conches? Pradadhmatuá¸¥ blew.No Commentary.
